_comment: MCP Server configuration for Claude Desktop
_setup_instructions: 1. Start Docker services: npm run docker:up (or docker-compose up -d)
2. Update the 'args' path to point to your mcp-server.js file
3. Add your API keys to the 'env' section
4. Docker default credentials are already set (password/password)
5. Place this file in your Claude Desktop config directory
